ygData.subject: Re: Family of Friends
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome to our list, Charlemagne.  I think everyone will agree that it is not only the absolute best cleric resource in conjunction with our (Rayne s) website,
ygData.messageBody:
Welcome to our list, Charlemagne. I think everyone will agree that it is
not only the absolute best cleric resource in conjunction with our (Rayne's)
website, but is the best all around for learning strategies, tips, info on
different classes, armor, weapons, etc. We have some of the most talented
and skilled players in all EQ right here, and I hope you enjoy your time
with us. I know I get better and better each day at my cleric profession
because of the folks who are here providing info.

Again..hail and well met.

Mikaela Valorblade, MFH
The Rathe
Moderator
----- Original Message -----
From: <king_charlemagne@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 15, 2000 4:14 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Family of Friends


> From: king_charlemagne@...
>
> Hail and Well Met
>
> I am a new member to this list nd just wanted to say hello to everyone. I
hope to learn much from this list and gain friendships from others on it.
Perhaps even grouping with some in the Future. I play on the a Paladin
mainly myself but am the Guildmaster of the new guild Family of Friends
http://www.geocities.com/onlineguild/ and make it my business to know about
all the different aspects of the game to help my fellow guildmates. Family
of Friends is currently recruiting and we have a membership application area
on our web site for potential recruits. Family of Friends resides on the
Bertoxxulous server. If nothing else there are two very useful links for
online gamers in general on our links page.
>
> ...And Justice For All
> Charlemagne
>
